main event: One round alternating orange, red and white object was sighted that hovered for 15 minutes in Roanoke Rapids, NC.
interesting points: The object was stationary and hovered during the observation., The sighting lasted for 15 minutes until the object faded away in a northerly direction., One object was reported in the sighting., The source of the information was the 1314th AACS., The sighting occurred on 11/20/57.
sighted object: one round object with alternating colors of orange, red, and white
